# Specifications: GCP Processing

## Overview

SpecKit specifications for feature development.

## Files

- **spec.md** - Detailed technical specification
- **plan.md** - Implementation task breakdown

## Feature Summary

Cloud-native audio processing pipeline using Google Cloud managed services:
- Cloud Storage for audio ingestion
- Cloud Speech-to-Text V2 for transcription with diarization
- Vertex AI for AudioSet classification
- Cloud Run for serverless execution

## Generated By

SpecKit workflow - Phase 2 (/2_plan)
